PSMV.Title: Playlist Sound Metadata Viewer
PSMV.NoMetadataRemote: No metadata (remote file or unknown path)
PSMV.CopySuccessClean: Metadata copied to clipboard (unknown info removed)
PSMV.ErrorNoTag: ID3 tag not found. This file may not have embedded metadata.
PSMV.Settings.ModuleDescName: [How to use Playlist Sound Metadata Viewer]
PSMV.Settings.ModuleDescHint:
This module is a tool to display and export metadata (title, artist, album) of music files registered in playlists.

[Main Functions]
1. Metadata display in Sound Config
   - Opening the sound edit screen automatically displays ID3 tag information.

2. Bulk Export
   - Export metadata of all playlists in Markdown format from the buttons at the bottom of the playlist sidebar.
   - 'Export Metadata': Exports all information
   - 'Export Metadata (Clean)': Exports only items with existing metadata
PSMV.Settings.DebugHint: Output detailed operation logs to the console. Use for troubleshooting.
PSMV.InitError: Playlist Sound Metadata Viewer: Initialization failed
